description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the War Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

War Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDivineFavo]{Divine Favor}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicWeapo]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShieldOfFa]{Shield of Faith}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCrusadersM]{Crusader's Mantle}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFreedomOfM]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStoneskin0]{Stoneskin}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCircleOfBu]{Circle of Power}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}
